pullRequest.title: [2.25.x] DDF-6218 Remove usage of PropertiesWrapper from AttributeQueryClaimsHandler
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR do?
Remove usage of PropertiesWrapper from AttributeQueryClaimsHandler
Add file reading logic to PropertyResolver
Lower unit test log levels on some security bundles
Who is reviewing it?

@emmberk

@SmithJosh

Select relevant component teams:

Ask 2 committers to review/merge the PR and tag them here.

How should this be tested?

What are the relevant tickets?
Fixes: #6218
Screenshots

Checklist:

 Documentation Updated
 Update / Add Threat Dragon models
 Update / Add Unit Tests
 Update / Add Integration Tests

Notes on Review Process
Please see Notes on Review Process for further guidance on requirements for merging and abbreviated reviews.
Review Comment Legend:

✏️ (Pencil) This comment is a nitpick or style suggestion, no action required for approval. This comment should provide a suggestion either as an in line code snippet or a gist.
❓ (Question Mark) This comment is to gain a clearer understanding of design or code choices, clarification is required but action may not be necessary for approval.
❗ (Exclamation Mark) This comment is critical and requires clarification or action before approval.

commit.message:
Remove usage of PropertiesWrapper from AttributeQueryClaimsHandler
Add file reading logic to PropertyResolver
Lower unit test log levels on some security bundles

nodes.bodyText: ✏️ Nit: Looks like this isn't being used.
✏️ Nit: Add @VisibleForTesting to setSignatureProperties and setEncryptionProperties.
✏️ Nit: Add unit tests for setSignaturePropertiesLocation and setEncryptionPropertiesLocation.
✏️ Nit: Can these be arguments instead of properties since they'll never change, right?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -46,8 +46,8 @@
         <property name="simpleSign" ref="simpleSign"/>
         <property name="issuer" value=""/>
         <property name="destination" value=""/>
-        <property name="signatureProperties" ref="signatureProperties"/>
-        <property name="encryptionProperties" ref="encryptionProperties"/>
+        <property name="signaturePropertiesLocation" value="${ddf.etc}/ws-security/server/signature.properties"/>
+        <property name="encryptionPropertiesLocation" value="${ddf.etc}/ws-security/server/encryption.properties"/>
